name: Heavy Metal Lover Asymmetric Dress
description:
Bring out the party animal in you with this stealth number. Fitted to show off your best assets and designed to hide any unwanted ones, you will be sure to dazzle the crowd with this showstopper. Sizes: Available in sizes 6 – 12 Colours: White and Spearmint (as pictured) Details:
  • Lined (polyester) fitted dress
  • One shoulder/sleeveless
  • Bejewelled on front of shoulder strap
  • Three spaghetti straps at the back of shoulder strap
  • Invisible Zip at the back in the centre
  • Crinkle crepe fabric

    • Shipping: Overnight courier delivery for all Australian domestic orders via Toll Priority Was: $169 Now: $135.20 Collection: HIGH SUMMER INJECTION 2011

name: Bad Romance One-shoulder Drape Dress
description:
Become the polished lady with sparkle in this delicate little number. With a sheer cheetah print overlay and embellished border, it’s the subtle hint of sexy for all the right reasons. Sizes: Available in sizes 6 - 14 Colours: Mink Pink (as pictured) Details:
  • Double layered (polyester) dress
  • Pleated sleeveless shoulder strap (right side)
  • Sheer animal-print (cheetah) overlay
  • Fitted underlay
  • Bead & sequin detailing along the hem moving up to the left shoulder (back and front)

    • Shipping: Overnight courier delivery for all Australian domestic orders via Toll Priority Was: $159 Now: $127.20 Collection: HIGH SUMMER INJECTION 2011

name: Electric Chapel Pocket Dress
description:
One of the key principles for any fashionista is to Keep It Simple Sexy! So why not do just that with this neutral number, perfectly designed to be the backdrop for some killer accessories OR subtly wow the crowd with the simple yet elegant details. Sizes: Available in sizes 8 - 12 Colours: Ivory (as pictured) Details:
  • Four fabric roses on each shoulder strap
  • Round neckline
  • Sleeveless
  • Pleated body
  • Lining underneath dress
  • Almost backless (2 separate 3.5cm strap; 1 across the top and another at the bra line)
  • Invisible zip at the back in the centre; zips up at the waistline
  • Pleated skirt (back and front)
  • Two front waist pockets

    • Shipping: Overnight courier delivery for all Australian domestic orders via Toll Priority Was: $139 Now: $111.20 COLLECTION: HIGH SUMMER INJECTION 2011

name: Electric Chapel Frill-bust Dress
description:
Slip into this fresh piece of shimmy fun for a quiet afternoon with the ladies or a night out on the town. Perfect for any and all occasions, this naughty but nice number is sure to please! Sizes: Available size 6 - 14 Colours: Coral (as pictured), Spearmint (as Heavy Metal Lover Asymmetric Dress) and Black. Details:
  • Double layered (polyester) dress
  • Finely striped sheer overlay
  • Keyhole back with single button
  • Adjustable Spaghetti Straps/Sleeveless
  • Four tier bust with beading edge finish

    • Shipping: Overnight courier delivery for all Australian domestic orders via Toll Priority Was: $139 Now: $111.20 Collection: HIGH SUMMER INJECTION 2011

name: Electric Chapel Multi-Striped Dress
description:
Summer playtime is here! And what better way to enjoy it than in this easy breezy trapeze dress (wow, that's a mouthful!). This double-layered piece will be sure to take you straight from a day on the beach to a night in the bar. Just swap those sandals for a pair of strappy heels and team it up with belt to cinch in your waist or keep it simple with statement jewellery. Either way, you're sure to party with ease and style. Sizes: Available in sizes 6 - 16 Colours: Multi Colour (as pictured) Details:
  • Double layer (polyester) dress
  • Non adjustable Spaghetti straps/Sleeveless
  • Sheer stripes outer layer

    • Shipping: Overnight courier delivery for all Australian domestic orders via Toll Priority Was: $869 Now: $71.20 Collection: HIGH SUMMER INJECTION 2011
